name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2023
description:
Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2023 puts you in the general manager's seat of your favorite professional basketball team like never before. If you have ever dreamed of being a basketball general manager then prepare to experience basketball nirvana.

Take over your favorite team and draft, trade, sign free agents and make strategic decisions to set them on a course to be the next great dynasty in this career based simulation. Enjoy the immersive, simulated gameplay and rich almanac storing an archive worth of stats and records while you make the day to day decisions to guide your franchise to the top of the basketball world. Check out the insanely detailed draft - you'll feel as if you're right in the middle of the real thing.

The redeveloped 2D gameplay makes watching or coaching your games exciting and more realistic than ever before. The new leveling up system for your character gives you total control over how your GM improves over time and rewards you for not only successful choices but gives you new opportunities to interact with the game world by taking part in press conferences or even playing daily fantasy basketball! New ratings like clutch scoring give players even more versatility and uniqueness making it even more important to build a cohesive roster.

This is the closest you'll get to living out your dream of running your favorite basketball team!
